quote_last:
. They died at the same time.”
“That’s not the same time, Harry.”
I waved a hand, impatient.
title: Blood Rites
author: Jim Butcher

quote_first: “This is the body I first saw at
quote_last: on Friday the fifteenth of October at Innocent House, Innocent Walk, Wapping.”
title: Original Sin
author: P.D. James
